trans-unit.source: Represents the value returned from a database comparison operation between Oracle data types, and exposes methods used to perform data type conversions.
trans-unit.target: 表示从数据库比较运算返回 Oracle 数据类型之间的值，并公开用于执行数据类型转换的方法。

trans-unit.source: The key difference between an OracleBoolean structure and a standard **Boolean** value is that, where a standard `Boolean` has two possible values, `true` and `false`, an OracleBoolean structure has three possible values, <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.True>, <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.False>, or <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Null>.
trans-unit.target: OracleBoolean 结构和一个标准的主要区别**布尔**值是，其中一个标准`Boolean`有两个可能的值，`true`和`false`，OracleBoolean 结构有三个可能的值， <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.True>， <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.False>，或<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Null>。</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Null> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.False> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.True>

trans-unit.source: An OracleBoolean structure does not map to an Oracle `Boolean` data type; it is exposed as a convenience support class.
trans-unit.target: OracleBoolean 结构未映射到 Oracle`Boolean`数据类型; 它作为公开一个方便的支持类。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> structure using the specified <xref uid="langword_csharp_Boolean" name="Boolean" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref>结构使用指定<xref uid="langword_csharp_Boolean" name="Boolean" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref uid="langword_csharp_Boolean" name="Boolean" href=""></xref> to be used as the initial value of the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> structure.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_Boolean" name="Boolean" href=""> </xref>用作的初始值<xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref>结构。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> structure using the specified integer.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref>结构使用指定的整数。

trans-unit.source: If `value` is 0, the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean> is `false`; otherwise it is `true`.
The <xref uid="langword_csharp_integer" name="integer" href=""></xref> to be used as the initial value of the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> structure.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_integer" name="integer" href=""> </xref>用作的初始值<xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref>结构。

trans-unit.source: Computes the bitwise AND of two specified <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> structures.
trans-unit.target: 计算两个指定的按位 AND <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"> </xref>结构。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> structure.
An <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> structure.
The result of the logical AND operation as shown in the following table.
trans-unit.target: 下表中所示逻辑与运算的结果。

trans-unit.source: Value of x
Value of y Result
Compares this <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> structure to a specified object and returns an indication of their relative values.
trans-unit.target: 比较此<xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref>结构与指定的对象并返回对其相对值的指示。

trans-unit.source: Any instance of <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean>, regardless of its value, is considered greater than a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: 任何实例<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean>，无论其值被视为大于空引用 (`Nothing`在 Visual Basic 中)。</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean>

trans-unit.source: An object to compare, or a null reference (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: 要比较对象，则为空引用 (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""> </xref>在 Visual Basic 中)。

trans-unit.source: A signed number indicating the relative values of the instance and value.
trans-unit.target: 一个带符号的数字，指示此实例和值的相对值。

trans-unit.source: Value
Description
A negative integer
This instance is less than value.
Zero
This instance is equal to value.
A positive integer
This instance is greater than value.
-or- value is a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: - value 为空引用 ( 在 Visual Basic 中)。

trans-unit.source: Compares the supplied object parameter to the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref>.
The object to be compared.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if object is an instance of <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> and the two are equal; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果对象的实例<xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref>和两种方法是相等; 否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Compares two <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> structures to determine if they are equal.
trans-unit.target: 比较两个<xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref>结构，以确定它们是否相等。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> structure.
An <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> structure.

An <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> that is <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> if the two instances are equal or <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> if the two instances are not equal.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"> </xref>即<xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref>如果两个实例是否相等或<xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref>如果两个实例是否不相等。

trans-unit.source: If either instance of <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> is null, the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Value*> of the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> is <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Null"></xref>.

Represents a false value that can be assigned to the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Value*> property of an instance of the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> structure.
trans-unit.target: 表示一个 false 值，可以分配给<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Value*>实例的属性<xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref>结构。</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Value*>

To be added.
Returns the hash code for this instance.
trans-unit.target: 返回此实例的哈希代码。

trans-unit.source: A 32-bit signed integer hash code.
trans-unit.target: 32 位有符号的整数哈希代码。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the current <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Value*> is <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.False"></xref>.
If the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Value%2A> is <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Null>, this property still is `false`.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if <xref uid="langword_csharp_Value" name="Value" href=""></xref> is <xref uid="langword_csharp_False" name="False" href=""></xref>, otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether or not the value of the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> structure is null.
trans-unit.target: 指示是否的值<xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref>结构为 null。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> value of the structure is **Null**, otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref>该结构的值是**Null**，否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the current <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Value*> is <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.True"></xref>.
If the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Value%2A> is <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Null>, this property still is `false`.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if <xref uid="langword_csharp_Value" name="Value" href=""></xref> is <xref uid="langword_csharp_True" name="True" href=""></xref>, otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>if <xref uid="langword_csharp_Value" name="Value" href=""></xref> is <xref uid="langword_csharp_True" name="True" href=""></xref>, otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.

An <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> that is <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> if the two instances are not equal or <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> if the two instances are equal.

If the value is null, the string contains a null value.

Value of y Result

Represents a value of zero that can be assigned to the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Value*> property of an instance of the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> structure.
trans-unit.target: 表示可以分配给的零值<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Value*>实例的属性<xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref>结构。</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Value*>

trans-unit.source: The Zero field is an <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean> structure constant.
To be added.
